com.compendium.core.datamodel.services
Interface IViewLayerService

All Superinterfaces:
IService
All Known Implementing Classes:
ViewLayerService
public interface IViewLayerService
extends IService

The interface for the ViewLayerService class The ViewLayer service class provides remote services to manipuate ViewLayer data.

Method Summary
 boolean createViewLayer(PCSession session, java.lang.String sUserID, ViewLayer view)
          Adds a new view layer to the database and returns it if successful.
 boolean deleteViewLayer(PCSession session, java.lang.String sUserID, java.lang.String sViewID)
          Deletes a view layer from the database and returns true if successful
 ViewLayer getViewLayer(PCSession session, java.lang.String sUserID, java.lang.String sViewID)
          Get the view layer record for the given user and view id.
 boolean updateViewLayer(PCSession session, java.lang.String sUserID, ViewLayer view)
          Update a view layer to the database and returns it if successful.

                        java.lang.String sUserID,
                        ViewLayer view)

Adds a new view layer to the database and returns it if successful.

Parameters:
PCSession - session, the PCSession object for the database to use.
String - sUserID, the user id of the user creating ths view property.
ViewLayer - view, the ViewLayer object to create a record for.
Returns:
boolean, true if the creation was successful, else false.

java.sql.SQLException

Deletes a view layer from the database and returns true if successful

                       java.lang.String sUserID,
                       java.lang.String sViewID)
                       throws java.sql.SQLException
Get the view layer record for the given user and view id.

Parameters:
PCSession - session, the PCSession object for the database to use.
String - sUserID, the user id of the user whose view layer to return.
String - sViewID, the id of the view for the view layer to return.
Returns:
ViewLayer, the ViewLayer record for the user id and view id given.
Throws:
java.sql.SQLException
